remarks: 3-variable restricted specialization, using implicit substitution. (Contributed by NM, 10-May-2005.)
statement:
rspc3v.1 $e |- ( x = A -> ( ph <-> ch ) ) $.
rspc3v.2 $e |- ( y = B -> ( ch <-> th ) ) $.
rspc3v.3 $e |- ( z = C -> ( th <-> ps ) ) $.
rspc3v $p |- ( ( A e. R /\ B e. S /\ C e. T ) -> ( A. x e. R A. y e. S A. z e. T ph -> ps ) ) $.
$d A x y z $.
$d B y z $.
$d C z $.
$d R x $.
$d S x y $.
$d T x y z $.
$d ch x $.
$d ps z $.
$d th y $.
